effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder has 1/2 its max [HP]{mechanic:hp} remaining or less, it consumes this item to restore 1/8 its max HP.  If the holder dislikes sour flavors (i.e., has a nature that lowers [Defense]{mechanic:defense}), it will also become [confused]{mechanic:confusion}.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed at 1/2 max HP to restore 1/8 max HP. Confuses Pokémon that dislike sour flavor.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　持たせると
ピンチのとき　ＨＰを　回復する。
きらいな味だと　混乱する。

If held by a Pokémon, it restores the
user’s HP in a pinch, but it will cause
confusion if the user hates the taste.

Se un Pokémon in difficoltà ha questa bacca,
recupera dei PS. Se al Pokémon non piace
il suo sapore, può causare confusione.
Una baya muy rara en la región de Teselia.

Als getragenes Item füllt die Beere die KP eines
Pokémon auf, doch ihr Aroma verwirrt jene,
die es nicht mögen.

Tenue, cette Baie restaure des PV en cas
de besoin, mais rend le Pokémon confus si
son goût lui déplaît.

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
위급할 때 HP를 회복한다.
싫어하는 맛이면 혼란에 빠진다.
